basic_positive.description: Slightly increases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

basic_negative.description: Slightly decreases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

moderate_positive.description: Moderately increases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

medium_.description: Moderately decreases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

extreme_positive.description: Drastically increases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

extreme_negative.description: Drastically decreases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters.

insane_positive.description: Increases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters by an absurd amount.

insane_negative.description: Decreases the reward you fighter receives for reducing the distance between the two fighters by an absurd amount.
